row.entry: If TRUE, models have been built successfully. (DO NOT EDIT) [TRUE,FALSE]
Status of prior build. (DO NOT EDIT)
TRUE implies always build model for openmp capability If FALSE, build model with openmp capability only if THREAD is greater than 1 [TRUE,FALSE]
Size of cice block in first horiz dimension. Value set by generate_cice_decomp.pl (called by configure). Only expert users should edit this
Size of cice block in second horiz dimension. Value set by generate_cice_decomp.pl (called by configure). Only expert users should edit this
cice block distribution type. Value set by generate_cice_decomp.pl (called by configure). Only expert users should edit this
Max number of cice blocks per processor. Value set by generate_cice_decomp.pl (called by configure). Only expert users should edit this
use MCT or ESMF component interfaces [MCT,ESMF]
TRUE implies turning on run and compile time debugging [TRUE,FALSE]
directory of esmf.mk in pre-built ESMF library
GLC land ice model number of elevation classes [0,3,5,10]
Fullname of GNU make command (usually gmake)
Optional ocean tracers. Any combination of: iage cfc ecosys
PIO configure options, see PIO configure utility for details
Size of pop block in first horiz dimension. Value determined by generate_pop_decomp.pl which is called by configure. Only expert users should edit this
Size of pop block in second horiz dimension. Value determined by generate_pop_decomp.pl which is called by configure. Only expert users should edit this
pop block distribution type. Value determined by generate_pop_decomp.pl which is called by configure
Max number of pop blocks per processor. Value determined by generate_pop_decomp.pl which is called by configure. Only expert users should edit this
smp status of previous build, coded string. (DO NOT EDIT)
smp status of current setup, coded string (DO NOT EDIT)
TRUE implies using the ESMF library specified by ESMF_LIBDIR or ESMFMKFILE [TRUE,FALSE]
